tool_description: Convert city locations to latitude/longitude coordinates and vice versa. This tool allows users to easily find geographical coordinates based on city names or retrieve city names from given coordinates.

api_list.name: /v1/geocoding
api_list.description: API Ninjas Geocoding API endpoint for converting city names to geographical coordinates.

required_parameters.name: city
required_parameters.description: The name of the city to be geocoded.

optional_parameters.name: country
optional_parameters.description: The name of the country, or its 2-letter or 3-letter ISO country code.

optional_parameters.name: state
optional_parameters.description: The US state for cities located in the United States.

api_list.name: /v1/reversegeocoding
api_list.description: API Ninjas Reverse Geocoding API endpoint for converting latitude and longitude coordinates back to city names.

required_parameters.name: lat
required_parameters.description: The latitude coordinate to be reverse geocoded.

required_parameters.name: lon
required_parameters.description: The longitude coordinate to be reverse geocoded.
